welcome: Welcome to the bot! Please choose an option from the menu below.
private_chat_only: This command is only available in private chat.
forward_message: Please forward a message from the user you want to report:
support: Please describe your issue and we will get back to you shortly.
choose_list: Please choose the list to which the user should be added:
invalid_forward_message: The forwarded message does not contain valid user information.
report_success: The user has been successfully added to the {list}.
user_deleted: User with ID {user_id} has been deleted.
